review: I love tech, and this little gadget is awesome.  For one, it's small and, therefore, very portable.  It's extremely affordable.  And it's wonderfully  easy to use.  I suppose I could get a Roku or some other device that had more apps, but really, how many services should one subscribe to before it's redundant and no longer cost effective.  No, this Chromecast meets my needs and more.  I highly recommend.
